document_data.name: ''The Song of One Harp''
document_data.author: [[Storm Silverhand]]
document_data.Contents: In it, Storm mused on the nature of life and society in the Realms. Her words, "a lifetime is scarce time enough to find a handful of truth," was a common saying of the Realms. [[Elminster]] and [[Ed of the Greenwood]] used this passage as a starting point for discussing life in the village of [[Maskyr's Eye]].
document_data.Availability: There was a copy of the book in [[Candlekeep]] by the early 1370s [[DR]].
